crt_updates.claim: Trust calibration is essential for effective AI deployment and user acceptance.
crt_updates.source: Trust Calibration for AI Agents - 2023-10-03, Executive Summary
crt_updates.reason: New evidence highlights the critical role of trust calibration in AI deployment.

crt_updates.claim: User feedback significantly influences trust calibration, leading to improved outcomes.
crt_updates.source: Trust Calibration for AI Agents - 2023-10-03, Detailed Findings
crt_updates.reason: Recent findings emphasize the importance of user feedback in trust calibration.

crt_updates.claim: Miscalibration of trust can lead to user disengagement and reduced effectiveness of AI systems.
crt_updates.source: Trust Calibration for AI Agents - 2023-10-03, Detailed Findings
crt_updates.reason: New evidence shows the negative impact of trust miscalibration on user engagement.

crt_updates.claim: Iterative testing improves trust calibration outcomes.
crt_updates.source: Trust Calibration for AI Agents - 2023-10-03, Recommendations
crt_updates.reason: New recommendations support the effectiveness of iterative testing in trust calibration.

crt_updates.claim: Transparency plays a crucial role in trust calibration.
crt_updates.source: Trust Calibration for AI Agents - 2023-10-03, Detailed Findings
crt_updates.reason: New findings indicate the importance of transparency in aligning user expectations.

crt_updates.claim: Different user demographics can impact trust calibration.
crt_updates.source: Trust Calibration for AI Agents - 2023-10-03, Detailed Findings
crt_updates.reason: New evidence suggests that demographic factors influence trust calibration.

vault_notes.title: Importance of Trust Calibration
vault_notes.content: Trust calibration is essential for effective AI deployment. It ensures AI agents operate effectively and are accepted by users.

vault_notes.title: User Feedback in Trust Calibration
vault_notes.content: User feedback significantly influences trust calibration. Iterative testing leads to improved outcomes.

vault_notes.title: Consequences of Trust Miscalibration
vault_notes.content: Miscalibration can lead to user disengagement. It reduces the effectiveness of AI systems.

vault_notes.title: Iterative Testing for Trust Calibration
vault_notes.content: Iterative testing improves trust calibration outcomes. It allows for adjustments based on user feedback.

vault_notes.title: Role of Transparency in Trust Calibration
vault_notes.content: Transparency is crucial for effective trust calibration. It helps align user expectations with AI performance.

vault_notes.title: Demographic Effects on Trust Calibration
vault_notes.content: Different user demographics can impact trust calibration. More demographic studies are needed to understand these effects.
